title: 10X Rectangle Magnifying Glass with Light, 5 Color Modes Stepless Dimmable Magnifier with Stand, LED Lighted Clamp Desk Lamp with Swing Arm, Hands Free for Reading Painting Close Work - White
description: Placing the controls directly on the head allows you to easily adjust the light with a quick touch, no fumbling with switches.
Easily customize the brightness from 10% to 100% and select the ideal light source for your environment with just a few taps.
The lamp remembers your previous brightness and light color settings, so there's no need to readjust every time you turn it on.
Desk Magnifier with Adjustable Swing Arm:

Crafted from high-quality metal, the swing arm features 3 knobs and 4 springs, providing excellent stability. You can easily position the magnifying glass and light to suit your working needs, freeing up both hands. The clamp can be mounted on any flat surface (up to 2.1" thick), such as a desktop, shelf, or workbench—no tools required.
Exterior Color: White Magnification: 10X Rectangular Glass Lens: 5*3 inch Color Temperature: 5 color modes Metal Clamp: Max 2.1 inch Swing Arm: 2 * 8.9" Metal swivel arm
1 x Magnifying Lamp 1 x Metal Clamp 1 x AC 5V/2A Adapter 1 x User Manual
